borderRadius.$description: progress.fill.borderRadius — Fill border radius (full). Matches track borderRadius for consistent pill shape.

duration.$description: progress.fill.transition.duration — Fill transition duration (300ms). Smooth animation when progress updates. Slow enough to be visible but not sluggish.

easing.$description: progress.fill.transition.easing — Fill transition easing. Ease-in-out creates natural-feeling progress advancement.

fontSize.$description: progress.label.fontSize — Label font size (12px). Small text fits inside larger track sizes (lg, xl).

fontWeight.$description: progress.label.fontWeight — Label font weight. Semibold ensures readability on colored fill background.

borderRadius.$description: progress.track.borderRadius — Track border radius (full). Pill-shaped track is the standard progress bar shape.

lg.$description: progress.track.height.lg — Large track height (12px). Use for: prominent progress bars, progress with labels.

md.$description: progress.track.height.md — Medium track height (8px). DEFAULT. Use for: standard progress bars.

sm.$description: progress.track.height.sm — Small track height (5px). Use for: compact progress bars, secondary indicators.

xl.$description: progress.track.height.xl — Extra large track height (16px). Use for: hero progress bars, progress with embedded text labels.

xs.$description: progress.track.height.xs — Extra small track height (3px). Use for: subtle progress indicators, inline progress.
